markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Catfolk Pouncer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2869)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Catfolk pouncers travel the world in search of new experiences. With a spring in their step and a positive attitude, a pouncer can usually lithely avoid or quickly bounce back from negative ordeals, much to their enemies' chagrin.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Catfolk_Pouncer.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Catfolk Pouncer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2869)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 52 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69)

**Languages**
[Amurrun](/Languages.aspx?ID=25), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (3), [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 17

</row>

**Cat's Luck** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=612)) **Trigger** The catfolk pouncer fails or critically fails a Reflex saving throw; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Reroll that saving throw and take the better result.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +8 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+3 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 +3 piercing

**Sudden Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The catfolk pouncer Strides twice. If the catfolk ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-377" />
name: Catfolk Pouncer

text: Catfolk Pouncer Catfolk pouncers travel the world in search of new experiences. With a spring in their step and a positive attitude, a pouncer can usually lithely avoid or quickly bounce back from negative ordeals, much to their enemies' chagrin. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 15 Unspecific Lore : DC 13 Specific Lore : DC 10 Catfolk Pouncer Source Monster Core pg. 52 1.1 Perception +6; low-light vision Languages Amurrun, Common Skills Acrobatics +7, Athletics +6, Nature +4, Stealth +7, Survival +4 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +1 Int -1 Wis +1 Cha +1 Items Dagger (3), Greataxe --- AC 17 Fort +6 Ref +9 Will +4 HP 17 Cat's Luck Reaction (fortune) Trigger The catfolk pouncer fails or critically fails a Reflex saving throw; Frequency once per day; Effect Reroll that saving throw and take the better result. --- Speed 30 feet Melee Single Action greataxe +8 (Sweep), Damage 1d12+3 slashing Melee Single Action dagger +9 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d4+3 piercing Ranged Single Action dagger +9 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4 +3 piercing Sudden Charge Two Actions The catfolk pouncer Strides twice. If the catfolk ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.
